column1: It’s an honor to have been selected by my colleagues to serve as Vice Chair of the Democratic Caucus. I’m looking forward to the opportunity to give San Bernardino County families a seat at the leadership table. https://t.co/0JG9Wp69BZ

I'm honored to have the opportunity to continue serving the Inland Empire in Congress and grateful for all the support that made this win possible. I've been proud to work across the aisle to deliver results for our region. I look forward to continuing that work.
ARIZONA: If you are in line to vote stay in line! As long as you are already in line to vote your ballot will be counted. Let’s win this thing! https://t.co/NNsaKq6nQc
I’m not going to serenade voters like @DarrenSoto but I agree that we need to show up in record numbers to elect @JoeBiden! https://t.co/MA9K9XM0Pe
Made the trip next door to Arizona this weekend to help get out the vote for @hiral4congress @KateWGallego @CaptMarkKelly and of course @JoeBiden! Eight more days! https://t.co/3C3Xw4KKBx

.@JoeBiden and @KamalaHarris get it. They see the strain being placed on working families and they have a plan to get through this crisis and build back better. That’s why we have to keep working to get left the Biden-Harris ticket on November 3. https://t.co/o73c0K3xcV
Join us this Friday to hear from our elected leaders and friends on what we can do to get out the vote! #BidenHarris2020 https://t.co/Ewa9YQda9r
It's a great day to check your voter registration and make a plan to vote! Visit https://t.co/JBKP9D7NAy for more information. #NationalVoterRegistrationDay

Proud to stand alongside our frontline workers to call upon @realDonaldTrump and Postmaster General DeJoy to put politics aside and finally fund the #PostOffice. Our safety and the fairness of our elections depends on it. https://t.co/JagPt8UM2R @RedlandsNews @sbsun
So proud of my friend @KamalaHarris and excited to have a Californian on the ticket. Can’t wait to get to work for #BidenHarris2020! https://t.co/Wcm4d4piiJ

We need a leader who will unite us.  We need a leader who will fight for systemic change.  We need a leader who cares about our country more than himself.  @JoeBiden is that leader. https://t.co/8S9ntUWOuo
Speaker @TeamPelosi came to Congress to chew bubble gum and kick ass and she’s been out of bubble gum for a while.   Happy birthday Madam Speaker. https://t.co/6aFfHQulH2

Standing up against some of the biggest threats facing our community – like gun violence and climate change – is not about party politics. It’s about working together.  We need a president who has a record of getting big things done. That’s why I’m endorsing @MikeBloomberg. https://t.co/8YRFFheYmb
